narrative: BE INNOVATIVE: Strategic Plans or Roadmaps for innovative projects. DESIGN VALUE: Impact Assessments or Evaluations of project outcomes. DEVELOP IDEAS: Innovation Portfolios showcasing a range of creative projects. DEFINE PROBLEMS: Research Papers or Articles on transformative ideas or methods. BE CURIOUS AND OPEN: Testimonials or Recognitions highlighting innovation leadership.

alignment.targetDescription: Make decisions when the result of that decision is uncertain, when the information available is partial or ambiguous, or when there is a risk of unintended outcomes. Within the valuecreating process, include structured ways of testing ideas and prototypes from the early stages, to reduce risks of failing. Handle fast-moving situations promptly and flexibly.
